price: Ela disse: "Ó dignitários! Instruí-me a respeito de meu assunto. Jamais decidi a respeito de assunto algum sem que o testemunhásseis."
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u aftūnī fī amrī mā kuntu qāṭiʿatan amran ḥattā tashhadūni
